    • Method Detail

      • findCallerStackTrace

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable java.lang.StackTraceElement findCallerStackTrace(java.lang.String className,
                                                                                    java.lang.String methodName)
        Returns caller stack trace of given class name and method name, or null if failed. This method is equivalent to findCallerStackTrace(String, String, int): 
             findCallerStackTrace(className, methodName, 0)

        This method searches the result of Thread.getStackTrace() of current thread, to find first StackTraceElement of which class name and method name are match given names. Let the next of found element be the caller, the caller will be returned.

        If stack trace element is null or empty, or the final index is out of bound, return null.

        Parameters:
        className - given class name
        methodName - given method name
        Returns:
        caller stack trace

      • findCallerStackTrace

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable java.lang.StackTraceElement findCallerStackTrace(java.lang.String className,
                                                                                    java.lang.String methodName,
                                                                                    int offset)
        Returns caller stack trace of given class name and method name, or null if failed.

        This method searches the result of Thread.getStackTrace() of current thread, to find first StackTraceElement of which class name and method name are match given names. Let the next of found element be the caller, if given offset is 0, the caller will be returned. Otherwise, the element at index of (caller's index + offset) will be returned.

        If stack trace element is null or empty, or the final index is out of bound, return null.

        Parameters:
        className - given class name
        methodName - given method name
        offset - given offset
        Returns:
        caller stack trace

      • stackTraceToString

        public static java.lang.String stackTraceToString(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Returns stack trace info of given throwable as string.
        Parameters:
        throwable - given throwable
        Returns:
        stack trace info as string

      • stackTraceToString

        public static java.lang.String stackTraceToString(java.lang.Throwable throwable,
                                                  @Nullable
                                                  @Nullable java.lang.String lineSeparator)
        Returns stack trace info of given throwable as string, the line separator of return string will be replaced by given line separator if given separator is not null.
        Parameters:
        throwable - given throwable
        lineSeparator - given separator
        Returns:
        stack trace info as string
